intro: I'm an English Ph.D Candidate turned full-stack web developer with a passion for creating engaging and user-friendly web applications. With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, Angular, JavaScript, and Java, I specialize in creating responsive designs that captivate and enhance user experiences.
about: In addition to my technical skills, I am an excellent communicator, leader, and team member. I decided to pivot my career to web development because I have always had a passion for solving problems, and I saw an opportunity to combine my love of lanuage and storytelling with my passion for technology.

I am confident that my background, skill set, and experiences give me a unique, and analytically motivated perspective on web development. I am excited to continue growing as a developer and to use my skills to create meaningful, engaging, intuitive and visually appealing projects for a wide range of audiences. So, let's connect!
background: Here's a little more about me. I have always been intersted in technology, and especially the internet, but I didn't really begin coding, or exploring web development as a career possibility until I started graduate school at Washington University in St. Louis. In my first year, I joined a reading group focused on digital approaches to the humanities. We would meet and talk about current "Digital Humanities" research that we found intersting and we'd teach eachother how to use a variety of tools that could enhance our humanities research. That's where I started to dabble in Python programming, which led me down the web development rabbit hole.

Fast forward to today, and I've had the privilege of working on a number of projects for professors, and the Film and Media archive, building and repairing website functionality. In 2022, I was accepted into an 8 month long web development bootcamp offered by LaunchCode. It's here where I've really started to hone my skills, and dive head first into web development. I consider myself a lifelong learner, on a constant pursuit to expand my skillset expanding my skillset to keep up with the ever-evolving world of software and web development. I am a problem-solver at heart and thrive on the challege of finding creative solutions to complex problems.
